医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
癌症治疗前后的身体活动如何改善治疗结果在化疗之前、期间和之后进行体力活动都是有益的。新的博士研究更仔细地研究了那些选择退出的人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/How-physical-activity-before-and-after-cancer-treatment-improves-outcomes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/How-physical-activity-before-and-after-cancer-treatment-improves-outcomes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=43942b01-3790-413e-baf3-ba3c777971e8 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 12:27:08 -0500 How physical activity before and after cancer treatment improves outcomes
地中海饮食可降低脂肪肝患者患 2 型糖尿病的风险研究人员调查了坚持地中海饮食如何降低患有代谢功能障碍相关脂肪肝病的成人患 2 型糖尿病的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mediterranean-diet-may-reduce-type-2-diabetes-risk-in-fatty-liver-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Mediterranean-diet-may-reduce-type-2-diabetes-risk-in-fatty-liver-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=82097788-ce3b-4dc7-b4a6-ddbee169931a Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:52:00 -0500 Mediterranean diet may reduce type-2 diabetes risk in fatty liver patients
液体活检检测胰腺偶发瘤的进展在最近发表在 eGastroenterology 上的研究中，J-Matthias Löhr 博士及其同事对胰腺偶发瘤的诊断方法进行了深入回顾；在针对其他疾病的成像扫描过程中经常检测到的偶然发现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advancements-in-liquid-biopsy-for-detecting-pancreatic-incidentalomas.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advancements-in-liquid-biopsy-for-detecting-pancreatic-incidentalomas.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ed2687d-8411-4ee6-bec2-a3f0cab63267 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:47:12 -0500 Advancements in liquid biopsy for detecting pancreatic incidentalomas
循环肿瘤细胞作为肝细胞癌早期检测的工具肝细胞癌（HCC）是一个重大的全球健康问题，特别是在亚太地区，慢性病毒性肝炎和肝病导致其高发病率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Circulated-tumor-cells-as-a-tool-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Circulated-tumor-cells-as-a-tool-for-early-detection-of-hepatocellular-carcinoma.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6228ff6a-5325-4f9d-a5b7-d3b44f50adb1 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:35:44 -0500 Circulating tumor cells as a tool for early detection of hepatocellular carcinoma
公众对 COVID-19 疫苗科学的信任影响美国疫苗的使用研究人员调查了美国公众对 COVID-19 疫苗科学的信任发生了怎样的变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Public-trust-in-COVID-19-vaccine-science-influences-vaccine-uptake-in-the-US.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Public-trust-in-COVID-19-vaccine-science-influences-vaccine-uptake-in-the-US.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97613f4e-79af-4a25-a55e-5f5959af8f52 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:25:00 -0500 Public trust in COVID-19 vaccine science influences vaccine uptake in the US
靶向铁死亡以克服消化道肿瘤的化疗耐药性消化道肿瘤对全球造成的负担是巨大的，这些癌症占全世界所有恶性肿瘤的近一半。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Targeting-ferroptosis-for-overcoming-chemoresistance-in-digestive-tract-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Targeting-ferroptosis-for-overcoming-chemoresistance-in-digestive-tract-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ad5b89e-3251-4768-87d5-6da849d277e1 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:13:05 -0500 Targeting ferroptosis for overcoming chemoresistance in digestive tract tumors
腹裂手术治疗进展腹裂是一种先天性腹壁缺陷，通过过去 60 年来的外科技术进步，它已从一种致命的疾病转变为 95% 存活率的疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advances-in-the-surgical-management-of-gastroschisis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Advances-in-the-surgical-management-of-gastroschisis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ad4fe647-0f57-4e86-87ec-04d0500da14c Fri, 08 Nov 2024 11:02:24 -0500 Advances in the surgical management of gastroschisis
新研究将遗传嵌合与降低患有唐氏综合症的成人患阿尔茨海默病的风险联系起来研究发现唐氏综合症的嵌合体可降低阿尔茨海默氏症的风险，为遗传对认知能力下降和痴呆症进展的影响提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-study-links-genic-mosaicism-to-lower-Alzheimere28099s-risk-in-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/New-study-links-genic-mosaicism-to-lower-Alzheimere28099s-risk-in-adults-with-Down-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b31271a2-13fa-4e57-85af-081f6bc4fc61 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 10:51:00 -0500 New study links genetic mosaicism to lower Alzheimer’s risk in adults with Down syndrome
探索研究肝纤维化消退的小鼠模型肝纤维化是一种进行性且可能可逆的疾病，由慢性肝损伤引起，可由多种因素引起，包括代谢功能障碍相关的脂肪肝病 (MASLD)、酗酒和病毒性肝炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-mouse-models-for-studying-liver-fibrosis-regression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Exploring-mouse-models-for-studying-liver-fibrosis-regression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f949e252-2946-4b9f-ba81-fc6c9677f973 Fri, 08 Nov 2024 10:49:46 -0500 Exploring mouse models for studying liver fibrosis regression
参与细胞分裂的关键激酶与遗传性疾病中异常血管生长有关抑制 CDK6 可能通过调节内皮细胞周期进程来预防遗传性出血性毛细血管扩张症的动静脉畸形。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Key-kinase-involved-in-cell-division-linked-to-abnormal-blood-vessel-growth-in-genic-disorder.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241108/Key-kinase-involved-in-cell-division-linked-to-abnormal-blood-vessel-growth-in-genic-disorder.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2b1ee70-83f9-4e75-a1c2-f10710e305ce Fri, 08 Nov 2024 10:11:00 -0500 Key kinase involved in cell division linked to abnormal blood vessel growth in genetic disorder
